title: FS Scrap Book Pages 85 Cards Cobb Matty Johnson HOF
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: FS Scrap Book Pages 85 Cards Cobb Matty Johnson HOF
posts.post_content:
I picked up two pages from a scrap book.  The interior of the book was dated 1942 however the glue is clear and seems to be cemet and when I tried to soak the one card I skinned the back.  That being said I do not know if they can be removed and I figured I would try them here before I started skinning some really nice cards.  There are about 85+ cards on both sheets, most T206 but a few other odds and ends.

Price is $6000 for the lot.

This large sheet has cards on both sides
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/t206sheet.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/t206sheetbk.jpg[/IMG]

This smaller sheet had the loose cards cut from the bottom area.
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/t206.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/t206sheetsmall.jpg[/IMG]

Any questions LMK.  Thanks

James G
